description: Number of ways writing 2^n as unordered sums of 2 primes.
references: Bohman, Jan and Froberg, Carl-Erik; Numerical results on the Goldbach conjecture. Nordisk Tidskr. Informationsbehandling (BIT) 15 (1975), no. 3, 239-243.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to Goldbach conjecture
maple: a:=proc(n) local c,k; c:=0: for k from 1 to floor((n-1)/2) do if isprime(2*k+1)=true and isprime(2*n-2*k-1)=true then c:=c+1 else c:=c fi od end: 0,0,1,seq(a(2*2^n),n=1..15); # _Emeric Deutsch_, Sep 22 2004
prog: (PARI) a(n)=my(N=2^n,s); forprime(q=2, N\2, s+=isprime(N-q)); s \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 02 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
